body: Sold in balls or spools of 50 feet, string and twine are useful for rigging traps and alarms and are a vital component of grappling bolts and arrows. String or twine has hardness 0, 1 hit point, and Break DC 14.
name: String or Twine
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Gear/Goods and Services/Adventuring Gear/String or Twine
